players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked by Alice's sudden death. We need to stay focused and work together to find out who did this."
You: "I think we should investigate Charlie's alibi for the time Alice died. We need to know if he was with anyone or anywhere else during that time."

Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions just yet. We need solid evidence before accusing anyone. I believe we should all share our whereabouts during the time of Alice's death to help clear up any suspicions."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
